abstract: E-commerce is a likely source of revenue for Twitter, said board member Todd Chaffee. Expect new feeds and filters, too.
snippet: E-commerce is a likely source of revenue for Twitter, said board member Todd Chaffee. Expect new feeds and filters, too.
lead_paragraph: Updated 6/20/09 1:20 p.m.: Clarified Todd Chaffee’s position on Twitter’s board.

headline.main: Twitter Plans to Offer Shopping Advice and Easy Purchasing
